about_the_game:
[About this game]

Metaline is a minimalist puzzle game. Your only goal is to connect all points with lines, and then enter the next level

Game play:



  • 1. Click the check point with the main mouse button, and then slide to the normal point to create a short line
  • 2. You need to gradually create lines between two identical checkpoints to connect them
  • "All points must be connected by lines, and you cannot omit any point that is not connected."
  • 4. All checkpoints must be endpoints. Similarly, all endpoints must be checkpoints
  • 5. All connections you create cannot cross each other

When all your lines meet the above conditions, you can win the level and then enter the next level.

The rules of the game are very simple, and Meta Lines is perfect for relaxing in your spare time while exercising your brain's thinking abilities.

Meta Lines is the second game I developed, and it will continue to be updated. I hope everyone likes it!

Thank you for your feedback and strong support for Meta Lines. If you encounter any issues in the game, have misleading content on the store page, want to give comments and suggestions, or simply want to say hello, you can contact me through the Steam game forum or email. I will spare no time to have a pleasant conversation with you as much as possible. If I did not respond to your information in a timely manner, I am very sorry, it may be that I did not notice, Or too busy, I will try to avoid it.

Thank you for taking the time to read this article, and I sincerely hope you enjoy my game. Y. J. ------ Matrix Science

Game features:



  • 1. As the level ordinal number increases, the difficulty will also increase
  • Minimalist interface, providing you with the most comfortable visual effects
  • 3. If you prefer, there are multiple color themes in the game for you to choose and replace, to avoid aesthetic fatigue as much as possible
  • 4. You can use white or black as the main color
  • 5. A few quiet, comfortable, and relaxed atmosphere music to alleviate your brain fatigue
  • 6. Support multiple languages such as English, Russian, Chinese, and French (of course, considering font compatibility issues, this will be gradually updated, please be patient while playing the game)
  • 7. Support for Steam Cloud archiving. When game data is accidentally cleaned up or the computer is replaced, past progress can be downloaded from Steam Cloud at any time
  • 8. There are a total of 29 simple and interesting achievements that you need to complete
  • 9. Extremely low pricing and frequent discounts
  • 10. In the future, I will carefully design more levels, and I eagerly hope for your challenge!

The audio in the game is a royalty free file provided by excellent websites such as freeSound

This page is translated using DeepL. If there is any misleading content, error propagation, or cultural sensitivity, please contact me at Steam Community or email.

Thank you for your help and feedback!

Thank you all!

name: Meta Lines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 +
  • Processor: Somewhat modern Dual Core +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB +
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Not too many requirements!
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Modern processors can basically ensure operation, and my game has very low hardware configuration requirements
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2x GTX 1080 TI （The same, you can give it a try and basically meet the requirements）
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: The game background music is very quiet and comfortable, I hope you like it! (What you hear is basically the authentic sound)
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: This is a puzzle game related to connections, and as the level index increases, the difficulty of the level will increase. Therefore, you have to use and call more mental resources. If you really don't know how to crack levels, please consider using the guidelines in the Steam community. (If you notice the "trial version" character in the bottom right corner of the game, please don't worry, I guarantee you will be playing the full version)

reviews:
“The levels get harder as you go, but that is to be expected.... I will let you in on a lil secret.... the dev himself is stuck on lvl 58...... shhhhh! ;) The progression is not an excessive jump in difficulty, but this is definitely only for adults and puzzle lovers. I cannot wait for even bigger and more challenging levels and I am sure anyone who loves this type of puzzle will be just as eager as I am for them to arrive! FINAL THOUGHTS: A well-presented and polished game that is a joy to play and behold. The dev has been thoughtful, communicates with players and is quick to respond to any issues that arise.... unlike other devs who have and do dump their games on this platform and then give us crickets! I highly recommend to all puzzle lovers to give this game a fair go. Replay ability is high, just like your favourite card or board game. It is cheap and worth every cent even at full price.... the dev should really consider raising the price in my opinion! This game could easily be sold for at least $3 - $5 and when it reaches 200 levels could well be worth paying $7.50. Yes, it is REALLY that good!”
Gypsyrose

“Вам просто нужно связать одинаковые точки, я люблю эту игру!”
Adonis

“これまでに100以上のレベルがあり、これはしばらくプレイできます”
Dempsey
short_description: When you feel bored, tired and dazzled by the cool game pictures, it's better to play a relaxed, intellectual and simple leisure game Meta Lines, which is suitable for playing while waiting in line for another game. Wish you have a good time !
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, French*, Italian*, German*, Greek*, Japanese*, Russian*, Traditional Chinese*, Spanish - Spain*, Danish*, Ukrainian*, Bulgarian*, Hungarian*, Turkish*, Norwegian*, Czech*, Polish*, Thai*, Swedish*, Romanian*, Finnish*, Dutch*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*, Vietnamese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
